Name: Badge Old School United Black
Description: Old school vintage badge with the words UNITED written in gold. This retro crimson enamel badge should take you back to your school days! Pin-backed, lozenge-shaped and perfect for general fans of United.Size: 4.5 cm x 1 cm

Description: Old school vintage badge with the words LIVERPOOL written in gold. This retro crimson enamel badge should take you back to your school days! Pin-backed, lozenge-shaped and perfect for Liverpudlians or just general fans of Liverpool.Size: 4.5 cm x 1 cm

Name: Badge Old School Dancing Queen
Description: Old school vintage badge shaped like a shield with the words DANCING QUEEN written in gold on a pink background. The perfect accessory to your outfit if attending School Disco or Hen Night.The card which the badge is pinned to is like a old vintage school card, which the parents had to sign and hand back to the headmaster, if your grades were good you get a badge which suits you.Size: 33mm x 25mm

Name: Pin Badge HOGWARTS
Description: Metal enamel badge "Draco- Dormiens Nunquam- Titillandus" for Harry Potter fans with the official emblem of Hogwarts. Enamel cover3,5 cm

Name: Keyring HOGWARTS
Description: You'll probably never own the keys to Hogwarts, but at least you can get a keyring! 4 cm x 4,5 cm

Name:
This Harry Potter Pin Badge would make a 
magical gift for any fan of the films and books, be it those who grew up
 with Harry, Ron and Hermione or those being introduced to the 
captivating magic of an amazing franchise. Perfect for birthdays and 
Christmas stocking fillers.
Pin Badge SLYTHERIN
Description: Attention: Not suitable for people who haven't read the books or seen the movies! Slytherin is one of the four Houses at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. Founded by Salazar Slytherin, the house is composed mostly of pure-blood students, due to its founder's mistrust of Muggle-borns.Enamel cover3,5 cm

Name: Pin Badge QUIDDITCH CAPTAINEnamel pin badge for every Harry Potter fan! In the fantasy world of the Harry Potter novels and movies, Quidditch is a magical competitive sport in involving flying contestants. Matches are played between two teams of seven players riding flying broomsticks, using four balls.Become the captain of the game and you'll surely get all points!
Description: Metal with enamel cover3,5 cm x 1 cm

Name: Pin Badge VOTES FOR WOMEN
Description: If you have voted for a woman at the last elections, then you surely need to own such badge!
